title: Three wise men of the world
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/South Africa - Social life and customs
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/South Africa - Social conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/South Africa - Economic conditions
description: A report on the Republic of South Africa - its peoples, cultures and transitions from yesterday into today. The overall socially and economically complex structure is light-heartedly parodied as something which can only too easily appear vastly different to differing observers. A public relations representation of South Africa in the late 1960s ignoring the contemporary political and racial tensions of the time.
